# UIToolbarDelegate

**Protocol**

The interface that toolbar delegate objects implement to manage the toolbar behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UIToolbarDelegate : UIBarPositioningDelegate
```

## Overview

This protocol declares no methods of its own, but conforms to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarPositioningDelegate] protocol to support the positioning of a toolbar when it’s moved to a window.

## Managing toolbar changes

- **delegate**: The toolbar’s delegate object.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
- UIBarPositioningDelegate
title: UIToolbarDelegate
